article: a bronx man with a long criminal record was identified friday by several witnesses as the gunman who calmly walked up behind a diamond merchant at dusk on a crowded midtown street last spring and shot him in the back of the head , law enforcement officials said .
abstract: bronx shooting is linked to a midtown case
